alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:37PM MST until February 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning Tuesday and Tuesday night, heavy snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph with near blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory through this evening, expect snow showers with 2 to 4 inches of snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from noon Tuesday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
